author: Chris Smith
title: Coffee fans will froth over this Sage Barista price cut
description: You can’t put a price on a really good coffee made in the comfort of your home. Well, you can actually, and this price is currently £100 off. John Lewis is selling Sage the Duo-Temp Pro Espresso Coffee Machine for just £299.95, down from the usual asking price of £399.95. It also comes with free […]The post Coffee fans will froth over this Sage Barista price cut appeared first on Trusted Reviews.

author: BusinessWorld
title: Figaro Coffee Group’s unit certified as coffee exporter
description: A SUBSIDIARY of listed food and beverage company Figaro Coffee Group, Inc. (FCG) has secured the government’s approval to become a coffee exporter. In a stock exchange disclosure on Monday, FCG said Figaro Innovation and Development, Inc. (FIDI) received its certification as a duly accredited coffee exporter from the Department of Trade and Industry (DTI) […]

author: Ryan Erik King
title: What's Your Most Out-Of-Depth Driving Experience?
description: Have you ever overestimated the winter capabilities of your car after a huge snowstorm? Did you take your typical grocery-getter to get battered on a forest trail? Did you take your brand new Ford Mustang to a Cars and Coffee? We’ve all been there. We’ve gotten in a car and bitten off more than we can chew. Sometimes,…Read more...

author: Anthony Segaert
title: The Sydney roads made from 136,000 coffee cups and 1.2m glass bottles
description: Recycled coffee cups have been combined with crushed glass to produce roads across the Penrith region.

title: League of Women Voters Cupertino-Sunnyvale hosts events

author: D. Earl Stephens
title: I wish Joe Biden was younger
description: Breezing through all the likely media sources Thursday morning while chugging black coffee and wiping the disgust from my eyes, I came across no less than five stories prominently dedicated to President Joe Biden’s age. I guess there’s not a whole lot else going on in this country that merits such big-time attention … Two of the stories I read had to do with a much-ballyhooed Wall Street Journal poll, that trumpeted 73 percent of Americans think the 80-year-old Biden “is too old to run for president.” This followed subsequent stories referencing an Associated Press poll 10 days ago...

title: I got 'Surprise Bags' from Starbucks and Costa Coffee at The Trafford Centre and was amazed
description: 'If you've never had one before then you need to give it a go'

author: Nicole Economos
title: ‘A late lunch of leftover couscous salad’: A 44-year-old shares her day on a plate
description: “I have water throughout the day – I don’t drink tea or coffee, so water is my go-to.”
